nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: A school fair asks students to display a vision board: 'What will you be in five years?' The question feels enormous.

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: I don't know yet. How do I answer without sounding lost?

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: Pick how to approach the board.

choices.text: Write a clear career goal to feel secure.
Write values and things you enjoy instead of a job.
Leave it blank and admit I don't know.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: You feel focused but also boxed in. Some classmates admire your clarity.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: Your board shows curiosity, kindness, creativity. Teachers nod approvingly â€” it feels honest.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: Someone whispers, but an older student says it's okay not to know. You feel a little lighter.

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: The future is a series of small steps. Being curious now matters more than having it all figured out.
